layerDigests.description: The sha256 digest of the image layer.

registryId.description: The AWS account ID associated with the registry to which to upload layers. If you do not specify a registry, the default registry is assumed.

repositoryName.description: The name of the repository to associate with the image layer.

uploadId.description: The upload ID from a previous InitiateLayerUpload operation to associate with the image layer.
